affixs.detail: All allies' final damage is increased based on their ailment accuracy. Final damage is increased by a maximum of 15% at 150% ailment accuracy.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Party's Psy damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 Berserk stack.
Berserk: Increase damage by a set amount. Stacks up to 3 times.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: If the party contains Guardians or Medics, all foes' final damage dealt is decreased by 60% and final damage taken is increased by 20%. If not, all foes' final damage dealt is increased by 60%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased final damage from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Foes' damage taken is increased by 10% for each elemental ailment they have, up to 40%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Party's Nuclear damage is increased by 20%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail:
At the end of each turn, foes gain 1 Berserk stack.
Berserk: Increase damage by a set amount. Stacks up to 3 times.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: If the party contains Guardians or Medics, all foes' final damage dealt is decreased by 60% and final damage taken is increased by 20%. If not, all foes' final damage dealt is increased by 60%.
affixs.name: Special Effect

affixs.detail: Allies are unable to deal critical hits, but deal increased final damage from skills and Resonances. This increase is equal to critical hit rate x (critical damage - 100%). (Max critical hit rate in this calculation is 100%).
affixs.name: Special Effect

mode.detail: Each turn, the boss's attacks grow stronger, and you get more points!
mode.name: Multidimensional Dreamscape
